title: inGitDB Root Config
description: Schema for the .ingitdb.yaml root configuration file that defines the root-level collections of an inGitDB database.

rootCollections.description: A map of root collection IDs to their relative directory paths. If a path ends with '*', all subdirectories at that path are treated as separate collections.

additionalProperties.description: Relative path to the collection directory. Use a trailing '*' to auto-discover sub-collections (e.g. 'data/*').
